thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Norrep Investment Management Group Announces Merger To Create Diversified Investment Management Firm

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Norrep Investment Management Group Announces Merger To Create Diversified Investment Management Firm

organizations.name: reuters) - norrep investment management group inc

text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Norrep Investment Management Group Inc:
* NORREP INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT GROUP INC., (“NIMG”), PARENT COMPANY OF NORREP CAPITAL MANAGEMENT LTD. (“NCM”) ANNOUNCES MERGER TO CREATE A DIVERSIFIED INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT FIRM WITH APPROXIMATELY $4 BILLION IN AUM
* NORREP INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT - TO MERGE BUSINESS WITH CUMBERLAND PARTNERS, PERRON & PARTNERS WEALTH MANAGEMENT, PERRON ASSET MANAGEMENT & AFFILIATES Source text for Eikon:
